lines.text: Mac, it's none of my business, and it certainly isn't up to me to give you advice, but if I had a weak heart ...
A man don't take nitroglycerine for dandruff.
[Several submarine crewmen are preparing to go ashore on a commando raid]

[Looks around at all the blackened faces and hands of the other crewmen]
I'm the only born commando here!
That isn't gold on your uniform - it's brass!
